The song captures a sense of wanderlust and the allure of the Californian landscape, combining airy melodies with reflective undertones.

The track is part of Samaná's broader discography that often explores deep emotional landscapes and personal narratives, set against lush, atmospheric soundscapes. The band's music typically features rich instrumentation and Tanner's evocative vocal delivery, which together create an immersive listening experience.

Al Barari (or Barari) is part of the new wave of eco-friendly communities in Dubai’s ever-growing real estate market. It is a gated community featuring luxurious villas, some of which are the most expensive in Dubai. Thus, Al Barari offers its residents a private, secluded environment with access to world-class amenities.

Al Barari Dubai has set high benchmarks for sustainable and luxurious living. This residential development spans a whopping 18 million sq. ft. and 60% of the community is composed of green spaces, landscaped gardens, natural lakes and freshwater streams. Al Barari in Arabic means wilderness, which is no surprise considering the amount of greenery in the area. It is, indeed one of the greenest communities in Dubai.

This beautiful villa is centred around an open plan flow that connects the living spaces to the naturalistic core of the house, the courtyard; a green focal point dominated by the splendour of a Chorisia tree with its long emerald pinnate leaves and silk floss blooms that appear every fall. Viewed through floor to ceiling windows from the surrounding rooms, the courtyard leads directly to the stunningly landscaped garden and pool, providing a seamless fusion between inside and outside from the top to the bottom of the villa. The Chorisia villas’ unique embrace of distinctive and sustainable green living is further enhanced by their bespoke luxury touches. From the sculpted marble staircases to the convenient lift between floors, every detail has been finished to the highest standards. The exemplary use of high-quality glass screens allows for flexibility in style, an airy sense of space and provide an abundance of natural light to bring every room to life. The ground floor features include an open living and dining area, a powder room, office space and an open kitchen with adjacent laundry and maid’s room amenities. Of the 5 bed, there are 3 master bedroom suites on the first floor, each of which has its own en-suite bathroom and private dressing room as well as a shared family area that overlooks the central courtyard and two master bedrooms on the second floor that share access to an expansive terrace from which to admire the lush oasis of Al Barari.

This unit and all other units in the building are entirely managed by Oryx leasing.
Oryx collect rent on furnished units (all bills paid basis), pay expenses like service charges, utilities, maintenace etc and then pay the net rent to the owners.

Additionally, they give 28 days complimentary stay for the owner, for which the owner can stay himself or rent to someone on short term furnished unit (all bills paid) basis. Since this property is close to tourist attraction (miracle garden) the 28 days can earn up to 10k approx. if rented during peak season time.
This unit is for sale as furnished unit. The property management contract will pass on to the next buyer.
The property management contract was signed for 20 years with 10 years remaining (expiry date 2034).
After expiry of property management contract (2034) the unit has to be managed by owner himself.
This is purely investor product (not end user product).

The Owner doesn't need to appoint any agent for this. The net rent is transferred by Oryx Leasing to the owner's bank account (anywhere in the world). The management company rent the property on furnished fully bills paid basis.

Chic Tower by de Grisogono is a 30-storey residential building under development in Business Bay, Dubai.
The project is being developed by Damac Properties through its subsidiary Pax Investment.
The residential building is located directly on the Dubai Water Canal. For more information, see our guide to the Dubai Water Canal.
Chic Tower by de Grisogono will comprise a mix of studios, one- and two-bedroom apartments.
Amenities will include a 24-hour concierge service, a gym, a spa, swimming pools and valet parking services.
The tower is conceptualised around turquoise, with master-jeweler de Grisigono bringing 'a unique interpretation of one of the world's most beloved gemstones. '
The podium will be home to baths and pools, beauty and juice bars, spas and gyms, cabanas and playgrounds, football arenas and party zones, and the centrepiece - a 180 meter-long lazy river.
The tower is located directly on the Dubai Water Canal offering residence views up and down the canal as well as the Business Bay skyline.
All apartments come with fitted kitchens, balcony terraces and ample storage space.
Both the interior and exterior design takes influence from the De Grisogono jewellery designs.
On the Podium level, the main spa extends to an outdoor gym equipped with calisthenic-focused equipment.
A stepped roof is inspired by the layers of rock pools and their cascading waterfalls.
The 'super luxury' units will have a terrace full of flowers, plants, an infinity pool, a personal gym and a film projection screen.

A series of 'revitalising baths' including hot baths, cold baths, salt baths and mud baths will be available and are said to 'extract toxins from your body and help your skin glow with the radiance of youth. '
A 'beauty bar' will allow residents to try custom-made creams that answer the specific needs of their skin type.
At time of launch, studios were priced from  AED 1 million, one-bedroom units from AED 1.8 million and two-bedroom units from AED 2.4 million.

Business Bay lies on the Dubai Canal, a waterway flowing from the Dubai Creek at Deira and out to sea again at Jumeirah Beach. Still in development, Business Bay comprises 64 million square feet of freehold projects and has established itself as a new business hub of the region, with office and residential towers, landscaped gardens and a network of roads and waterways. This up-and-coming district is attracting businesses from around the world and sharp-witted investors buying into it.

Following the economic downturn of 2008, the proportion of residential buildings has risen in comparison to commercial buildings, so that now there are more apartments coming onto the market here than originally envisaged in the master plan.

Marasi Business Bay is a novel development made possible by the Dubai Canal connection to the open sea. Comprising a collection of floating \'water homes\', a marina and associated shops and promenades, Marasi is at the centre of a transformed Business Bay as ferries, yachts and water taxis make their way out to sea just as they do at Dubai Marina.

Bugatti Residences by Binghatti is the world’s first Bugatti Residences in Dubai. The project was created by the UAE-based developer, Binghatti Properties Investments Limited, and the French luxury brand, Bugatti. The upcoming development will consist of two towers with 45 residential floors and be reminiscent of the home of Bugatti, the Château Saint-Jean, and boast French Riviera vibes, making it a real masterpiece nestled in Business Bay.

Premium amenities located on the territory of Bugatti Residences by Binghatti will let you cultivate L’art de Vivre. They include a Riviera-inspired beach, a gymnasium with training services and a VIP owner lounge. Among the services available to the occupants of the project, there will be concierge, spa, valet, chauffeur, butler, housekeeping and bodyguard services. Dining venues and a private chef service will be especially appreciated by gourmet dining lovers. A private garage, a car lift and a parking access card will be available.
